main.about-p1: My passion for technology and coding led me to pursue a degree in Computer Science and Engineering, where I honed my computer science expertise and had the privilege of sharing my knowledge as a teaching assistant.
main.about-p2: As a Project Controller Assistant at WEIR Minerals, I've excelled in clear communication and collaboration through regular project meetings and detailed client updates. During my roles at George Brown College, my adaptability shone as I tailored workshops and provided feedback to meet evolving student needs.
main.about-p3: Currently, my focus is on cultivating a career in software engineering. My aspiration is to play a pivotal role in crafting high-quality applications within a collaborative work environment that values shared goals and principles.
